8480.TW.summary: Taisun Int'l (Holding) Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells disposable baby diapers, adult incontinent, feminine sanitary napkins, and wet tissues products. Its brands include UniDry, Sunmed, SunMate, Yo Yo, Sunfree, and Unifresh. The company exports its products to approximately 20 countries worldwide. Taisun Int'l (Holding) Corporation was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
